titleStmt.title: Loves paradice. Shewing the admirable felicity that true-lovers enjoy in the chaste imbraces of their dearest loves, as this following example doth declare. To the tune of Frances Phoenix. / by J. P.
titleStmt.author: J. P.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Right half sheet contains: The second part, to the same tune.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
